full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
* 5P435-230085: Snowshed Light Fixtures Glacier National Park

#### Tender Details
| **Category**   | **Description**                                                                                                                                                                |
| :------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Reference Number  | WS4159106812-Doc4291509484                                                                                                                          |
| Amendment Number  | 1                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Solicitation Number | WS4159106812                                                                                                                                       |
| Publication Date   | November 3, 2023                                                                                                                                           |
| Tender Closing Date  | November 27, 2023 at 14:00:00 hours EST (Eastern Standard Time)                                                                       |
| Amendment Date | November 23, 2023                                                                                                                                            |
| Tender Status       | Cancelled                                                                                                                                            |

#### Procurement Information
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Supply Information
* UNSPSC Code: 39111600
* UNSPSC Description: Exterior Lighting Fixtures and Accessories
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Delivery and Regions
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

#### Contact
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Katie Wong, [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][1]

[1]: katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Official Website and Documents
* Discovery documentation: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17913808?extsite=MTc5MTM4MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Description
Parks Canada’s Highway Engineering Services seeks the supply of 14 LED luminaires manufactured by Schréder, complete with NYX Hemera module integration. The bid documents are available on the official website of Parks Canada. The bid submission deadline is November 27, 2023. The bid is classified in UNSPSC Code 39111600.
